This face is closed and forms a loop. 4. **Scale the 2D sketch** by a factor of 0.75. 5. **Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D Sketch** using the given coordinate system. 6. **Extrude the 2D sketch** along the Z-axis by 0.375 units. This will generate the 3D model for the first part, a rectangular box base. The dimensions of this base are as follows: - Length: 0.75 units - Width: 0.375 units - Height: 0.75 units Continue with the next parts of the assembly, following the same pattern and procedure as described above.</description>
